price: 109. Los dignatarios del pueblo del Faraón dijeron: “Ciertamente, este es un brujo instruido
arabic: قَالَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ مِن قَوۡمِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَسَٰحِرٌ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: qāla al-mala-u min qawmi fir'ʿawna inna hādhā lasāḥirun ʿalīmun
